articles.author: Paul Wiseman
articles.title: US likely enjoyed hiring spree in July as economy rebounds - Associated Press
articles.description: WASHINGTON (AP) — Hiring surged in July as American employers added 943,000 jobs. The unemployment rate dropped to 5.4% another sign that the U.S. economy continues to bounce back with surprising vigor from last year’s coronavirus shutdown.
articles.content: WASHINGTON (AP) Hiring surged in July as American employers added 943,000 jobs. The unemployment rate dropped to 5.4% another sign that the U.S. economy continues to bounce back with surprising vigor… [+2463 chars]

articles.title: Nigerian lawyer wins American Bar Association international human rights award - TheCable
articles.description: Adeola Oyinlade, a Nigerian human rights lawyer, has won the 2021 American Bar Association (ABA) international human rights award.
articles.content:
